function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Limited testing capacity and throughput due to current diagnostic methods","Impact":"Higher probability of undetected infections and delayed response to outbreaks","Mitigation":"Use of more advanced diagnostic testing methods like pooled-sample analysis and antigen testing","Technologies":"Pooled-sample analysis, advanced antigen testing","People":"General population, healthcare workers, public health officials","Owner":"Healthcare facilities, public health organizations"},{"Description":"Insufficient targeting of higher-risk sub-populations for testing","Impact":"Wastage of diagnostic tests and resources, higher risk of undetected infections in high-risk groups","Mitigation":"Pre-targeting sub-populations with higher probability of infection","Technologies":"Data analysis for risk assessment, targeted testing strategies","People":"High-risk sub-populations, public health officials","Owner":"Public health organizations, research institutions"},{"Description":"Privacy, ethics, and legal concerns limiting the application of WBE","Impact":"Restricted use of WBE for public health monitoring and disease control","Mitigation":"Address privacy, ethics, and legal concerns through policy and regulation","Technologies":"Privacy-preserving data collection and analysis methods, policy frameworks","People":"Public health officials, legal experts, policymakers","Owner":"Government, regulatory authorities"}]}
